title: Mammal Collection Storage Cabinets Gift Fund
description: To be used to purchase new cabinets for storing the CU Museum of Natural History Mammal Collection; if unspent or underspent, to fund Vertebrate Zoology curatorial needs.
marketingContent: To be used to purchase new cabinets for storing the Mammal Collection at the CU Museum of Natural History; if unspent or underspent, to fund Vertebrate Section curatorial needs.
